Changelog
=========


0.9.3 (2013-09-23)
------------------

- Added a new add_gritter function to allow adding gritter messages unrelated
  to plone portal messages
  [ale-rt]


0.9.2 (2013-09-10)
------------------

- The stickiness and persistence time of the popup can be configured now
  (see README.rst)
  [ale-rt]


0.9.1 (2013-07-30)
------------------

- Fixinig broken release [ale-rt]


0.9.0 (2013-07-30)
------------------

- Initial release.
  [ale-rt]
